name: Omar Al-Mansoori
description: Omar, a 40-year-old analytical individual from a Middle Eastern background, is navigating technology as a novice. With limited mobility, he seeks to teach his elderly parent how to use video calls, valuing the ability to maintain connectedness despite physical constraints. Although very reserved and cautious in his decision-making, Omar’s flexible environment allows him to dedicate time for this task, motivated by a desire to enhance family communication through technology.

task_profile.task: teach my parent to use video calls

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Basic video functionality with screen sharing
additional_requirements: Availability of tech support during initial use

metadata.task: teach my parent to use video calls
